basics.name: Owen Josse
basics.summary: Currently in PhD at LAMA, Université Gustave Eiffel, and CERMICS, Ecole des Ponts et Chaussés working on graphons

work.company: CERMICS, Ecole Nationale des Ponts et Chaussées
highlights: Co-evolution of Dynamic Graphs and Graphons : graphon-valued processes
Weak solutions of fractional SPDEs for stochastic optimization problems

work.company: Société des Grands Projets (formerly Société du Grand Paris)
work.position: Innovation project management and environmental expertise
highlights: Engineering internship in the public company responsible for the construction of metro networks in Paris

education.institution: Université Gustave Eiffel, LAMA and Ecole des Ponts et Chaussés, CERMICS
highlights: Co-evolution of Dynamic Graphs and Graphons : graphon-valued processes

education.area: M.S. Mathématiques de l'aléatoire (Probability and Statistics)
courses: Percolations, Random Graphs, Branching Processes and Structured Populations...

highlights: Research project : construction of random measurement in correlated random environment with Alexandre Richard, MICS
Research Program : Real Trees and Fractional Brownian Motion with Erick Herbin, MICS

teaching.course: Teaching Assistant (TD) in the course 'Méthodogie Mathématique'
